channel.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server] Hurry! Apply today!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2dh5imx.png[/img][/center] [hr] [center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/97i8v8.png[/img] [size=10pt]Welcome to [b]Definitive X[/b] Development Team [i][b]I have not been doing anything at all, for a very long time, So I thought I would start again![/b][/i][/size]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img] [b]Base:[/b] [i]Shards[/i] [b]Sub-Base:[/b] [i]CreativeScape[/i]
My name is Danny, I have been coding server's for about 4 years now. I started this project last July and worked on it for 3 months. I have started again and have been working 24/7 on this. I believe it's going to be a huge hit.
[u][b]A couple goals for this server are:[/b][/u] • Make a Rs-2006 server, but with a unique custom vibe, that is both unlike Rs it's self, but also unlike any other Rs Private Server. • Make a stable server that is always online, always stable, no dupes, cheats, glitches, bugs or anything of that sort. • Make sure that no matter what kind of player you are, whether pure, or skill, you will be able to make money, have fun, and always have something to do. • Most of all, BE SUCCESSFUL! This will [i]not[/i] be a donators-rule server. There will be memberships that last for one month. These members will have their own area in the world, and in that area there will be easier ways to train, both skilling levels and combat levels; there will be extra monsters for them, and so on. This will be a runescape-like server, but with those extra features that [i]rsps's[/i] have, (like commands, easier training, easier money-making, etc.). We will have a RS Classic website [i]with[/i] a forum. (In a couple days).
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img]
Home is in Port Phasmatys, although we call it "Ghost-Town", or just simply "Home".
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29mmyr6.png[/img]
Added [b]a lot[/b] of doors, stairs, npcs/shops. • 100% Dwarf Multicannon. • 9 non-member quests | 2 member quests [table] [tr] [td] ◦ Dwarf Cannon ◦ Horror From The Deep ◦ Lost City ◦ Romeo & Juliet ◦ Rune Mysteries ◦ The Mage's Challenge ◦ Dragon Slayer ◦ Cook's Assistant ◦ Witch's Potion ◦ Champion's Challenge ◦ Gertrude's Cat [/td] [/tr] [/table]
The features are endless.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/dpv1uw.png[/img][/center]
[center]Finished Home. All Npc Shops and Dialogues in home area are complete. Made all teleports teleport the player to the correct coordinates. (This includes rings, amulets, necklaces, etc) Added a new login screen. [/center]
[center][size=12pt][u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u][/size] (more coming soon).
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/4r52yx.png[/img] This is an old picture.[/center]
[center][size=12pt][u][b]Videos:[/b][/u][/size] (more coming soon).
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Dg4XRGjuDw&feature=plcp[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltoJ7eFvnuw&feature=plcp[/youtube]
[size=14pt][b]Team:[/b][/size]
High Administrator: 2/2 Gfx: 0/2 Coders: 2/3 Admin: 0/1 Moderator: 0/3 Web Designer/Developer: 1/1
[code]Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Years with Java: (Only Coders need to fill this out Java knowledge?(1/10): Only Coders need to fill this out Proof of any work?: Only Coders need to fill this out)[/code]
-Danny aka Mr...x.. (Me) -k1ng0frs
I support all compliments and/or criticism so please comment.
[right]-Dfx .[/right]

[/quote]
That’s not against the rules…[/quote]

Actually, yes it is.

item.dc:creator: @Definitive_X Definitive X
item.description:
@Definitive_X wrote:

[quote=“Demolitionx711, post:2, topic:444738”]Applying for?: Part Time Coder
Why should we choose you?: Because I have a lot of experience and can bring A LOT to this server.
Will you stay dedicated?: I will stay dedicated but I cannot promise I will be coding this all day every day because I do have my own project.
Age:14
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Easily, Nobody messes with me I don’t mess with them.
How many hours a day are you usually on?:I’m on 6 hours a day, I can spend 2+ on this project.
Years with Java: 3 (Only Coders need to fill this out
Java knowledge?(1/10): 8 Only Coders need to fill this out
Proof of any work?: Demolitionx 667, Torvascape 317, Demolitionx 639 Only Coders need to fill this out)c[/quote]
I’d like to know more about what you have done… Do you have Skype or MSN?

Read full topic

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @Definitive_X Definitive X
item.description:
@Definitive_X wrote:

[center][/center]
[hr]
[center]
[size=10pt]Welcome to Definitive X
Development Team
I have not been doing anything at all, for a very long time, So I thought I would start again![/size]


Base: Shards
Sub-Base: CreativeScape

My name is Danny, I have been coding server’s for about 4 years now. I started this project last July and worked on it for 3 months. I have started again and have been working 24/7 on this. I believe it’s going to be a huge hit.

A couple goals for this server are:
• Make a Rs-2006 server, but with a unique custom vibe, that is both unlike Rs it’s self, but also unlike any other Rs Private Server.
• Make a stable server that is always online, always stable, no dupes, cheats, glitches, bugs or anything of that sort.
• Make sure that no matter what kind of player you are, whether pure, or skill, you will be able to make money, have fun, and always have something to do.
• Most of all, BE SUCCESSFUL!
This will not be a donators-rule server.
There will be memberships that last for one month.
These members will have their own area in the world, and in that area there will be easier ways to train, both skilling levels and combat levels; there will be extra monsters for them, and so on.
This will be a runescape-like server, but with those extra features that rsps’s have, (like commands, easier training, easier money-making, etc.).
We will have a RS Classic website with a forum. (In a couple days).

Home is in Port Phasmatys, although we call it “Ghost-Town”, or just simply “Home”.

Added a lot of doors, stairs, npcs/shops.
• 100% Dwarf Multicannon.
• 9 non-member quests | 2 member quests
[table]
[tr]
[td] ◦ Dwarf Cannon
◦ Horror From The Deep
◦ Lost City
◦ Romeo & Juliet
◦ Rune Mysteries
◦ The Mage’s Challenge
◦ Dragon Slayer
◦ Cook’s Assistant
◦ Witch’s Potion
◦ Champion’s Challenge
◦ Gertrude’s Cat
[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

The features are endless.

[/center]

[center]Finished Home.
All Npc Shops and Dialogues in home area are complete.
Made all teleports teleport the player to the correct coordinates.
(This includes rings, amulets, necklaces, etc)
Added a new login screen.
[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Pictures:[/size] (more coming soon).


This is an old picture.[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Videos:[/size] (more coming soon).

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Dg4XRGjuDw&feature=plcp[/youtube]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltoJ7eFvnuw&feature=plcp[/youtube]

[size=14pt]Team:[/size]

High Administrator: 2/2
Gfx: 0/2
Coders: 2/3
Admin: 0/1
Moderator: 0/3
Web Designer/Developer: 1/1

Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Years with Java: (Only Coders need to fill this out Java knowledge?(1/10): Only Coders need to fill this out Proof of any work?: Only Coders need to fill this out)

-Danny aka Mr…x… (Me)
-k1ng0frs

I support all compliments and/or criticism so please comment.

[right]-Dfx .[/right]
